entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Guelph
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:38 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Guelph Turfgrass Institute 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: ENE 14 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning late this afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets before morning. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
